title: Runeterra's Regions knowledge on the void
body:
While we know that champions and some residents in Shurima, Mount Targon, Frejlord and Marai Territory are fully aware of the Void.

What about the other regions of the world such as Demacia, Noxus, Piltover, Zaun, Ionia, Ixtal, Bilgewater, Bandle city and even the Shadow Isles? 

I know that those Regions are having their own problems themselves to really care but the Void is a pretty big threat since only a small number of champions such as {{champion:24}}{{champion:38}} {{champion:145}} {{champion:136}} {{champion:26}}{{champion:127}} {{champion:267}} are actively trying to prevent the Void from taking over Runeterra. 

What are the rest of the regions doing about this growing threat? Do they even have any intel or knowledge on the Void and the creatures that are starting to spread around Shurima? You would think that The Master Tactician Swain would have more information on them.

replies.body: Some regions have probably heard the tales of the "twisted beings" or "great devourers" and there may be some stories but nothing more... Most of those you mentioned are probably oblivious to the void, which also makes sense as even the nations are much younger and than the void events that occurred so the only way for them to know about the void is through written materials or stories( keep in mind most written evidence was destroyed through all the wars and conflicts be it internal or external)..

Well, technically... Bandle City is not a "region of the world"

But Piltover, Ixtal and Zaun seem to be aware of it thanks to {{champion:54}}

Ixtal possibly since Zilean "might" have told them something about the void.
Piltover and Zaun I doubt.
Malphite doesn't know what the creatures are as well, he only described them "Creatures that live only to consume." and Shoorai the Zaunite that was talking to Malphite personally knows what the Creatures are and the city of Icathia.

Taric's backstory seems to indicate that Demacia has a vague understanding of the Void. I doubt Noxus does, though, or the nobles would all have Kog'maw as a pet and outfit their armies with Cho'Gath siege tanks.

Was gonna mention Taric myself. I feel as though with the Icathia update and the Void update last year the Void is now a much more obscure thing. Not a massive world ending threat that the world fought off before and remembers. Only the Ascended, Icathians, Celestials and Lissandra likely know about them as well as champs like Rengar that directly confronted a Void champ. Rengar couldn't even put what Kha Zix was into words saying it was "wrong". 

I'm not saying they are too secret but just that random townspeople wouldn't understand what they are. To a lesser degree for sure than it was before the Void updates. 

People don't even remember Morde for Chris sakes and he came waaaay later and was relevant in Valoran which the Void really weren't
Unless you were unlucky enough to have run into one or are one of the regions you listed, most people don't know about the Void and even if some of their myths and stories are about voidborn.

I'd assume Ixtal and any Kumungu-residence are aware because the Void's "main Location" on Icathia is pretty close to their territory, hell, Rengar is having a dicksize measuring with Kha'Zix in that damn jungle and it's safe to say, considering how long Kha'Zix has been there, that other Kumungu-residents like Zyra and Nidalee know of him, and by extention, of the void.
